name: War The Dead Killer
description:
War The Dead Killer is the new free shooting real zombie war game of the year.You and your sniper rifle are the only survivors of a zombie infection. In this zombie death free shooter game a virus infected the whole world except you

Features:
• Action game
• Realistic physics of shooter game.
• Accurate 3D sniper rifle
• Kills counter
• Leader boards with your friends in death killer.
